pullrequest.title: Simplify the process of using gazebo as a library

content.raw:
There's a lot of sensor test failures (from console output of [partially finished Jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/197/consoleFull)):
~~~
The following tests FAILED:
	101 - UNIT_Sensor_TEST (Failed)
	109 - UNIT_GpuRaySensor_TEST (OTHER_FAULT)
	110 - check_UNIT_GpuRaySensor_TEST (Failed)
	111 - UNIT_SensorManager_TEST (Failed)
~~~
